STATUS

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x14
Size:
0x4

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:6] - - - -
[5] RXEMPTY r 0x1 -
[4] RXIDLE r 0x1 -
[3] TXIDLE r 0x1 -
[2] TXEMPTY r 0x1 -
[1] RXFULL r - -
[0] TXFULL r - -

Field Descriptions

RXEMPTY

RX FIFO is empty

RXIDLE

RX is idle

TXIDLE

TX FIFO is empty and all bits have been transmitted

TXEMPTY

TX FIFO is empty

RXFULL

RX buffer is full

TXFULL

TX buffer is full
